metadata.title: CVE-2021-46322 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Duktape v2.99.99 was discovered to contain a SEGV vulnerability via thecomponent duk_push_tval in duktape/duk_api_stack.c.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.1: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
duktape: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
